title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 4 ยง 200.1 - Act; board
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 4 ยง 200.1 - Act; board

State Regulations

The term
act, as used in this Chapter, shall
mean the New York State Public Employees' Fair Employment Act, and the terms
board
and
agency
shall each mean the New York

State Public Employment Relations Board, or any two members
thereof. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 4
ยง
200.1

Amended

New

York State Register August 2, 2017/Volume XXXIX, Issue 31, eff. 8/2/2017

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
